attributes.action: introduce a law to limit the mark up on events tickets by ticket agencies and make it a criminal offence to charge more than 25 percent over face value
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law should be introduced from stopping ticket agencies from buying up tickets for sporting/music events and then selling them for an extreme mark up, eg European cup final tickets being sold for £1100 +.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
